Name: Detective Solitaire. Butler Story 2
About the game: A detective world and solitaire! Explore the locations of an ancient mansion. 200 game levels in the solitaire genre of tripeaks. Collect cards in sequence to get to the gold cards.. - Solitaire card game - collect a chain of cards! - Exciting levels that won't let you get bored! - Pick cards faster, thanks to the joker - increase the combo multiplier, That gives you more coins! - Original themed decks and 9 card shirt styles!
